name: california
content:
Add to word list

a state on the west coast of the US, whose capital city is Sacramento and whose largest city is Los Angeles: Take some time out to discover the joys of California. California wines rank among the best in the world.
More examplesFewer examplesThey have been close friends since their schooldays in California.She lives and works in southern California.
